Contributing and Support¶

Community contributions¶

Contributions to geopolrisk-py are welcome.

Guidelines for contributing code, reporting bugs, and proposing improvements are provided in the repository contribution guide:

https://github.com/akoyamp/geopolrisk-py/blob/main/CONTRIBUTING.md

Users are encouraged to follow these guidelines when submitting pull requests or suggesting changes.

Reporting issues¶

Bug reports, feature requests, and reproducible technical issues should be submitted via the GitHub issue tracker:

https://github.com/akoyamp/geopolrisk-py/issues

Using the issue tracker ensures that problems and discussions are publicly visible and traceable.

Support and contact¶

For questions related to the GeoPolRisk method, interpretation of results, or academic use of the software, users may contact the corresponding author:

Anish Koyamparambath anish.koyam@hotmail.com

geopolrisk-py
